              "bounds": [300, 300],
              "children": [

                  "position": [0, 285],
                  "bounds": [285, 15]

                  "position": [285, 0],
                  "bounds": [15, 285]
                },
                {
                  "position": [285, 285],

                  "drawsContent": true
